alert.note: Alert for Crowley; El Paso; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 4:56PM MDT until July 08 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern El Paso County in east central Colorado... Northwestern Crowley County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 455 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Schriever AFB, or 21 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Schriever AFB, Hanover and Truckton. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
